The intersection of compliance and data considerations:

**Compliance:**
Fiduciary duties are legal obligations to act in another's best interest. Three core duties: 1) Duty of Care (prudent decision-making), 2) Duty of Loyalty (avoid conflicts of interest), 3) Duty of Good Faith (act honestly). Applies to trustees, investment advisers (RIAs), ERISA plans. Breach can result in personal liability.
